bioAsHtml: Niek is a Software Architect at Atos. He is experienced in developing Open Source based solution in an Agile environment and empowering the team with continuous integration and delivery strategies. Niek has created the technical modules for the DevOps academy and coached teams in Agile and Continuous delivery practices. He also loves travelling (continuously).

acceptedTalks.title: What I learned around the world about DevOps
